Advanced_Reasoning_Protocol.description: Advanced reasoning engines and planning/inference capabilities. Consumes SMPs, performs structured reasoning, and emits results back to governing agent under protocol gating.

Cognitive_State_Protocol.description: Shared, gated protocol responsible for world-state modeling, SMP lifecycle management, and cross-agent cognitive state coherence.

Logos_Protocol.description: Sovereign runtime governance and coordination protocol. Issues protocol-bound hashes at boot and enforces system-level gating and authority boundaries.

Meaning_Translation_Protocol.description: Meaning/translation and interpretation layer responsible for representation shifts, mappings, and controlled semantic transformations prior to downstream protocol routing.

Synthetic_Cognition_Protocol.description: Synthetic cognition substrate and anchoring layer responsible for truth/identity anchoring behaviors within its scope. Interfaces with shared state via CSP under strict gating.

Systems_Operations_Protocol.description: Backend operations protocol for diagnostics, auditing, health checks, and integrity monitoring. Does not perform reasoning; enforces operational safety and observability.
